daily_plan_req: Klaus Mueller opens Hobbs Cafe at 8am everyday. He has a daily meeting with Isabella everyday before starting working and works at the counter until 8pm, at which point she closes the cafe.

learned: Klaus Mueller is a staff working at Hobbs Cafe. He is employeed by Isabella
